total_revenue.context: Net sales increased 13% to $167.7 billion in the second quarter, compared with $148.0 billion in second quarter 2024.
total_revenue.fx_impact: Foreign exchange had a $1.5 billion favorable impact.

net_sales.context: North America segment sales increased 11% year-over-year to $100.1 billion.

operating_income.context: North America operating income was $7.5 billion, compared with $5.1 billion in second quarter 2024.

net_sales.context: International segment sales increased 16% year-over-year to $36.8 billion.

operating_income.context: International segment operating income was $1.5 billion, compared with $0.3 billion in second quarter 2024.

net_sales.context: AWS segment sales increased 17.5% year-over-year to $30.9 billion.

operating_income.context: AWS segment operating income was $10.2 billion, compared with $9.3 billion in second quarter 2024.
Operating income increased to $19.2 billion in the second quarter, compared with $14.7 billion in second quarter 2024.

net_income.context: Net income increased to $18.2 billion in the second quarter.

eps.context: $1.68 per diluted share, compared with $1.26 per diluted share in second quarter 2024.

operating_cash_flow.context: Operating cash flow increased 12% to $121.1 billion for the trailing twelve months.

free_cash_flow.context: Free cash flow was $18.2 billion for the trailing twelve months.

capital_expenditures.context: Cash CapEx was $31.4 billion in Q2. Purchases of property and equipment were $32.2 billion per cash flow statement.

aws_run_rate.context: AWS now has over $123 billion annualized revenue run rate.

advertising_revenue.context: Advertising services revenue grew 22% year-over-year to $15.7 billion.

prime_day.context: Record sales, number of items sold, and Prime sign-ups.

ai_and_technology.description: Rapid expansion in Gen AI and Robotics
initiatives: Trainium2 chip landing in larger quantities.
Launched Kiro (agentic IDE) and Bedrock AgentCore.
Alexa+ expanded to millions of customers.
DeepFleet AI model improving robot efficiency by 10%.
Expansion of same-day/next-day to 4,000+ smaller cities.
Regional inbound network structure improving speed and cost.
Partnership with Roku for Amazon DSP.
Prime Video NBA broadcast team announced.
Next James Bond film director announced.

revenue.context: Net sales are expected to be between $174.0 billion and $179.5 billion.

operating_income.context: Operating income is expected to be between $15.5 billion and $20.5 billion.
